content.value: public ValueTask<RunSummary> Run(IXunitTestCase testCase, IReadOnlyCollection<IXunitTest> tests, IMessageBus messageBus, ExceptionAggregator aggregator, CancellationTokenSource cancellationTokenSource, string displayName, string? skipReason, ExplicitOption explicitOption, object?[] constructorArguments)

Public Function Run(testCase As IXunitTestCase, tests As IReadOnlyCollection(Of IXunitTest), messageBus As IMessageBus, aggregator As ExceptionAggregator, cancellationTokenSource As CancellationTokenSource, displayName As String, skipReason As String, explicitOption As ExplicitOption, constructorArguments As Object()) As ValueTask(Of RunSummary)

parameters.description: The test case that this invocation belongs to.
The tests for the test case.
The message bus to report run status to.
The exception aggregator used to run code and collect exceptions.
The task cancellation token source, used to cancel the test run.
The display name of the test case.
The skip reason, if the test is to be skipped.
A flag to indicate how explicit tests should be treated.
The arguments to be passed to the test class constructor.

return.description: Returns summary information about the test that was run.

children.remarks: This entry point is used for both single-test (like and individual data rows for tests) and multi-test test cases (like when pre-enumeration is disable or the theory data was not serializable).

parameters.description: The context that describes the current test method

return.description: Returns summary information about the test case run.

children.summary: Override this method to run an individual test.

summary: The test case runner for xUnit.net v3 tests.
